name: cfmapitem
description: This tag creates markers on the map.
discouraged: The use of tags generating UI is generally discouraged by the CFML community. See: https://static.raymondcamden.com/cfuitherightway/cfmap/index.html

params.name: longitude
params.description: The longitude value for the marker, in degrees.

params.name: address
params.description: The address of the location to set the map marker.

params.name: tip
params.description: A short description of the marker location that appears as a tool tip.

params.name: latitude
params.description: The latitude value for the marker, in degrees.

params.name: showMarkerWindow
params.description: When true, the marker infowindow is shown. By default, this is false. This is inherited by all cfmapitem tags.

params.name: markerWindowContent
params.description: Static inner html markup to be displayed in the infowindow opened when the marker is clicked. This is mutually exclusive with the markerbind attribute

params.name: markerIcon
params.description: Location of an image file to use as the marker icon. The attributes markericon and markercolor are mutually exclusive.

params.name: markerColor
params.description: Indicates the color of the marker.
